item.title: Jona Lewie - Stop the Cavalry
item.description:
Ukulele play along of Stop The Cavalry by Jona Lewie Using the chords: A E7 G D
This video is meant for educational purposes.
No copyright infringement intended - original recording by Jona Lewie
Note: Try using 2nd, 3rd and 4th dingers for the D chord, especially changing between D and A.
